author: @wsfa12news
title: First Alert: Tracking plenty of heat & humidity this weekend
text: Rain chances will be typical of summer, isolated to pop-up in nature. MONTGOMERY, Ala. (WSFA) - The first weekend of August will feature plenty of heat and humidity. In fact, most locations will soar into the mid to upper 90s Friday through Sunday... Factor in the humidity and “feels like” temperatures will push near or above the triple-digit mark each afternoon. Friday was hot and humid! Those lucky enough to get rain were still hot, but those who miss out on the showers easily reached the mid to upper 90s. Throw in some humidity and it felt every bit of 105-108 degrees during the afternoon! As for rain chances looking forward, they won’t change much… isolated to widely scattered in nature during our wettest point of the day is all we expect. Much of our Saturday and Sunday will be dry, but briefly your outdoor plans could get interrupted by a passing storm. This weather pattern is forecast to remain the same through early next workweek. We expect a similar pattern to unfold this weekend with afternoon temperatures in the mid 90s and that “feels like” numbers soaring close to or above 100 degrees each afternoon. Showers and storms will be hard to come by with only 10-30% of us getting wet this weekend. Watch the latest live and local weather data below, streaming on WSFA Weather Now! Please note, this stream does not include live severe weather coverage, only data on the latest weather conditions. If that’s not enough, as many head back to school next week… as of right now, the weather will remain on the hot and humid side. With highs soaring into the middle to upper 90s each afternoon, heat index values in or near the 100s and the low end chance for an isolated shower or storm. Making for a sweltering start back to school for many across central and south Alabama. In the tropics, a cluster of storms in the central Atlantic Ocean shows potential for development over the next five to seven days. It will move in the general direction of the Bahamas and/or Florida by the end of the week and into the first weekend of August and get the name Debby! Still a lot of questions on where this potential tropical system will track when/if formed… models are pushing the potential storm towards the Gulf of Mexico and eventually into Florida. With no official system developed, this is something we will watch closely through the weekend and into next week. Copyright 2024 WSFA. All rights reserved.

author: SRN Editor
title: A call to end prayer in the British legislature
text:
(SRN NEWS) – Ever since 1558, members of Parliament have paused at the beginning of each daily session to ask God’s guidance and blessing on their proceedings.
But now a group of lawmakers are urging the House of Commons to end the practice, calling it “outmoded, outdated and not compatible with 21st century society.”
Apparently both liberals and conservatives want an end to prayer.
Roughly half of the current Parliament is non-Christian.
topics: Religion and Belief->relations between religion and government

author: Diario El Dia de La Plata www.eldia.com
title: Wanda vs Icardi, ahora por los autos: desde un Rolls Royce y un Bently, hasta un Lexus personalizado
text:
Wanda Nara y Mauro Icardi comenzaron la guerra por los autos. Ahora, también se dieron a conocer los modelos, sus valores y los reclamos.
Sabido es que, Mauro Icardi viajó a Italia con la China Suárez y el motivo del vuelo a Milán tuvo que ver con un llamado de la Justicia italiana.
El mencionado viaje es por una causa que tiene con Wanda Nara por la división de bienes y concretamente, media docena de vehículos que se disputan en este divorcio.
Asimismo, se filtraron diferentes audios pero, a diferencia del material que se conoció con anterioridad, se los escucha con algunas chicanas y ninguneos de por medio, en un tono que toca la armonía y la cargada.
En este contexto, la vedette es el Rolls-Royce Boat Tail, color bronce, el mismo que tiene el actual presidente de Estados Unidos Donald Trump, valuado en 26 millones de euros. Como si fuera poco, por otro lado, mostraron el Lexus LC 500 que, con los detalles personalizados, cuesta 2.6 millones de euros.
Estos los tienen en Italia, aseguraron desde el círculo íntimo de la ex pareja. Se supo además que tienen otros tres en Turquía. Una camioneta Cadillac Escalade, cuyo valor es de 90 mil dólares. Un Mercedes Benz de aproximadamente 160 mil dólares y una camioneta Ford Raptor de 71 mil dólares.
Se filtró también que existe un tremendo tironeo con un sexto auto. Se trata de un Suv Bentley, que Wanda lo tiene estacionado en París, con un valor superior a los 300 mil euros.
Finalmente, se conoció que en uno de los tantos audios, Mauro le reclamó por los vehículos, y Wanda le respondió: “Mau, la lista de autos que mandaste a pedir estaban en la división de bienes, y están a mi nombre. Es un error, después hablamos. Te mando un beso”, tiró Nara.
Así, Icardi le contestó: “Bueno, si los autos están a nombre tuyo, pagá los 200 mil euros de tienen de deuda, y listo. Nos hablamos", cerró Mauro.
Las noticias locales nunca fueron tan importantes
